text: la yazal bunyan almunafiqin aldhy bnwh mdarrat lamasjid (qba') shkana wnfaqana makthana fi qlwbhm, 'iilaa 'ana ttqte qulubuhum biqatlihim 'aw mwthm, 'aw bndmhm ghayat alndm, wtwbthm 'iilaa rbhm, wkhwfhm minh ghayat alkhwf. wallah ealim bima ealayh hwla' almunafiqun min alshaku wama qsdu fi bnayhm, hakim fi tadbir 'umur khlqh
